method.title: Method
method.measuredTooltip: Emission measurement based on internationally approved or corresponding method (direct/indirect, continuous/periodic or single measurement)
method.calculatedTooltip: Calculation of emissions with internationally agreed or corresponding national method (e.g. physical-chemical correlation, emission factor, mass balance)
method.estimatedTooltip: Expert judgement based on e.g. earlier measurements, studies or experience

classification.HWshortTooltip: Hazardous waste is defined in Article 3.2 of Directive 2008/98/EC.
classification.NONHWshortTooltip: Non-hazardous waste is defined in Article 3.2 of Directive 2008/98/EC.
classification.title: Type of waste
classification.HW: Hazardous waste as defined by Article 2(14) of the E-PRTR

treatment.DTooltip: Disposal is defined in Article 3.2 of Directive 2008/98/EC.
treatment.RTooltip: Recovery is defined in Article 3.2 of Directive 2008/98/EC.
treatment.title: Treatment

descriptions.Facilities: Search for facilities by using the map or the table. Filtering is possible by industry sector, municipality or the name of the facility. Clicking on the facility reveals more information on emissions and waste transfers for the selected facility.
descriptions.emissionsToAir: Start browsing emission data by selecting the pollutant. It is possible to filter the information by year or location. Information of a specific facility can be found under the facility search.
descriptions.emissionsToWater: Start browsing emission information by selecting¬†the pollutant. It is possible to filter the information by year or location. For finding detailed information of a specific facility, please use the facility search feature.
descriptions.wasteTransfers: You can browse waste transfers by year or location. Transfers of a specific facility can be found through the facility search. Hazardous waste is defined in Article 3.2 of the Directive 2008/98/EC. Non-hazardous waste is labeled as "Other".
